llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Of course! I'd be happy to help you design a week-long travel itinerary for your group of 5, departing from Washington and visiting three different cities in Indiana. Based on the information provided, here's a potential itinerary that meets your requirements:

Day 1 (March 23rd): Departure from Washington

* Drive to Evansville, IN (approximately 5 hours and 45 minutes)
* Check-in at a hotel suitable for children under 10 years of age (such as the Holiday Inn Evansville - West or the Drury Inn & Suites Evansville)

Day 2 (March 24th): Evansville

* Visit the Mesker Park Zoo and Botanical Garden (cost: $25 per person)
* Explore the Evansville Museum (cost: $10 per person)
* Enjoy dinner at a family-friendly restaurant (such as the Happy Gnome or the Black Angus Steakhouse)

Day 3 (March 25th): Evansville to South Bend

* Drive to South Bend (approximately 2 hours and 15 minutes)
* Check-in at a hotel suitable for children under 10 years of age (such as the Homewood Suites by Hilton South Bend or the Fairfield Inn & Suites South Bend)

Day 4 (March 26th): South Bend

* Visit the St. Joseph County Public Library (free admission)
* Explore the South Bend Chocolate Company (cost: $5 per person)
* Enjoy dinner at a family-friendly restaurant (such as the Brew Coffee & Provisions or the Fuzzy's Taco's)

Day 5 (March 27th): South Bend to Fort Wayne

* Drive to Fort Wayne (approximately 1 hour and 46 minutes)
* Check-in at a hotel suitable for children under 10 years of age (such as the Fort Wayne Embassy Suites or the Hilton Fort Wayne)

Day 6 (March 28th): Fort Wayne

* Visit the Foellinger Theatre (cost: $10 per person)
* Explore the Fort Wayne Children's Zoo (cost: $10 per person)
* Enjoy dinner at a family-friendly restaurant (such as the Bistro on Main or the O'Charley's)

Day 7 (March 29th): Departure from Fort Wayne

* Check-out of hotel
* Drive back to Washington (approximately 8 hours and 52 minutes)

Budget Breakdown:

* Accommodations: $10,600 (avg. $2,120 per night x 5 nights)
* Transportation: $2,300 (avg. $460 per day x 5 days)
* Food and Activities: $9,500 (avg. $1,875 per day x 5 days)

Total Budget: $23,800

Note: These costs are estimates based on the information provided and may vary depending on individual preferences and exchange rates.

I hope this itinerary helps you plan a fun and memorable trip for your group! Let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance.
